name: n8n-nodes-botamin
description: Botamin custom nodes for Kafka transport (trigger + output).

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp -R nodes dist && cp dist/nodes/BotassistKafkaTrigger/kafka.svg dist/BotassistKafkaTrigger/ && cp dist/nodes/BotassistKafkaOutput/kafka.svg dist/BotassistKafkaOutput/
